Text:
utorrent has removed idtags from the mkv files in this torrent. as a result i no longer have complete torrent to seed. i am stuck with 99.7% as everybody else. unless somebody who managed to dl complete set before it went belly up reseeds. it will never go beyond 99.7%. i apologise to everybody who spent time downloading this torrent. i have tried everything to fix it. the episodes are still perfectly watchable on vlc media player as only id tags have been removed all movie data is still intact. 
zaq2qaz
